```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```
 
```{r}
library(spData)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
linestring_matrix = rbind(c(45, 55), c(44, 54))
line <- st_linestring(linestring_matrix) %>%
  st_sfc(crs=4326)%>%
  st_sf()

```

```{r}
polygon_list = list(rbind(c(13.9, 55), c(24.2, 55), c(24.2, 48.9), c(14, 48.9), c(13.9, 55)))
kwadrat <- st_polygon(polygon_list) %>%
  st_sfc(crs = 4326)%>%
  st_sf()
```

```{r}
Polska <-world %>%
  filter(name_long =="Poland")
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = kwadrat) +
  geom_sf(data = Polska) +
  geom_sf(data = line)
```
